DOC.brief_summary: This study assess LDL-C lower efficacy safety ETC-1002 versus placebo subject hypercholesterolemia history statin intolerance .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Efficacy Safety ETC-1002 Subjects With Statin Intolerance
DOC.criteria: Key A history statin intolerance begin statin treatment resolve within 4 week stop statin treatment For subject current lipidregulating drug LDLC 100220 mg/dL triglyceride < 350 mg/dL ( prior washout lipidregulating drug supplement ) For subject current lipidregulating drug LDLC 115270 mg/dL fast TG < 400 mg/dL Key Acute significant cardiovascular disease Poorly control hypertension
